commits: 17ef02b: fix(auto-yes): apply windowing to detectThinking() to prevent stale thinking lines from blocking prompt detection
message: TDD implementation complete. Applied windowing (last 50 lines) to detectThinking() in pollAutoYes() to prevent stale thinking summary lines from permanently blocking prompt detection. 3 new tests added, all 42 tests pass. Coverage: 86.77% statements, 87.82% lines.
